Cross_point Struct Reference

#include <board.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Representation of 1 intersection on the board.

Instancies of this class are used to represent go board in Board_manager::board. It contains coordinates together with pointer to a block of stones which contains stone lying on this coordinate ( NULL when it is empty ).
